about_the_game:
The Worms™ Reloaded "Time Attack" pack features 20 new heart-pounding single-player race missions designed to test players’ Rope and Jet Pack skills to the limit! The "Time Attack" pack also includes 3 new hats, 3 new speech banks, 3 new gravestones, a new "Time Attack" landscape theme and 12 new Achievements.

Key Features

  • 20 new single-player "Time Attack" maps, with leaderboards.
  • 1 new "Time Attack" landscape theme.
  • 3 new hats.
  • 3 new speech banks.
  • 3 new gravestones.
  • 12 new Achievements.
detailed_description:
The Worms™ Reloaded "Time Attack" pack features 20 new heart-pounding single-player race missions designed to test players’ Rope and Jet Pack skills to the limit! The "Time Attack" pack also includes 3 new hats, 3 new speech banks, 3 new gravestones, a new "Time Attack" landscape theme and 12 new Achievements.

Key Features

  • 20 new single-player "Time Attack" maps, with leaderboards.
  • 1 new "Time Attack" landscape theme.
  • 3 new hats.
  • 3 new speech banks.
  • 3 new gravestones.
  • 12 new Achievements.

pc_requirements.minimum:
• OS *: Windows XP, Vista, 7
  • Processor: 1.25GHz AMD Athlon or Intel equivalent
  • Memory: 1GB
  • Graphics: 128MB Video Card (GeForce4 or equivalent card)
  • DirectX®: DirectX® 9 or above
  • Hard Drive: 2063MB
  • Sound: DirectX® 9.0c-compliant sound card
  • Other Requirements: Internet connection required
